:::config { "language": "hcl", "theme": "material-theme-palenight" }
resource "aws_instance" "a_web_instance" {
  ami           = data.aws_ami.app.id
  instance_type = "t3.small"

  root_block_device {
    volume_size = 8 # GB
    volume_type = "gp3"
  }

  tags = {
    Name        = "super-amazing-domain-name-staging-web"
    Project     = "super-amazing-domain-name.io"
    Environment = "staging"
    ManagedBy   = "terraform"
  }
}

resource "aws_eip" "super_awesome_addr" {
  ## Another fantastic comment.
  # instance = aws_instance.super_awesome.id

  vpc      = true

  lifecycle {
    prevent_destroy = true
  }

  tags = {
    Name        = "super_awesome-staging-web-address"
    Project     = "super_awesome.io"
    Environment = "staging"
    ManagedBy   = "terraform"
  }
}

resource "aws_eip_association" "eip_assoc" {
  instance_id   = aws_instance.super_awesome_web.id
  allocation_id = aws_eip.super_awesome_addr.id
}
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='material-theme-palenight' data-lang='hcl' class='phiki language-hcl material-theme-palenight torchlight' style='background-color: #292D3E;color: #A6ACCD;--theme-selection-background: #00000080'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> 1</span><span class="token" style="color: #FFCB6B;">resource</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">&quot;aws_instance&quot;</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">&quot;a_web_instance&quot;</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">

</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">16</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">17</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">18</span><span class="token" style="color: #FFCB6B;">resource</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">&quot;aws_eip&quot;</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">&quot;super_awesome_addr&quot;</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">19</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #676E95;">#</span><span class="token" style="color: #676E95;"># Another fantastic comment.
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">20</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #676E95;">#</span><span class="token" style="color: #676E95;"> instance = aws_instance.super_awesome.id
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">21</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">22</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">vpc</span><span class="token">      </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">true</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">23</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">24</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #FFCB6B;">lifecycle</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">25</span><span class="token">    </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">prevent_destroy</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">true</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">26</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">27</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">28</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">tags</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">29</span><span class="token">    </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">Name</span><span class="token">        </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token" style="color: #C3E88D;">super_awesome-staging-web-address</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">30</span><span class="token">    </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">Project</span><span class="token">     </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token" style="color: #C3E88D;">super_awesome.io</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">31</span><span class="token">    </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">Environment</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token" style="color: #C3E88D;">staging</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">32</span><span class="token">    </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">ManagedBy</span><span class="token">   </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token" style="color: #C3E88D;">terraform</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&quot;</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">33</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">34</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">}</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">35</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">36</span><span class="token" style="color: #FFCB6B;">resource</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">&quot;aws_eip_association&quot;</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">&quot;eip_assoc&quot;</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">37</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">instance_id</span><span class="token">   </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #f07178;">aws_instance</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">super_awesome_web</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">id</span><span class="token">
</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">38</span><span class="token">  </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">allocation_id</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #f07178;">aws_eip</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">super_awesome_addr</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">id</span><span class="token">

</span></div></code></pre>
